module_switch_description: Evaluates an input variable against a series of cases and directs the flow to the port whose rule is met first.
module_switch_tutorial:
HOW TO USE:
1. Connect an output from another node to this node's input.
2. Open Properties, select the 'Variable to Check'.
3. Add one or more 'Cases'. Each 'Comparison Value' you enter will automatically become a new output port name.
4. Connect those output ports to the subsequent workflow.
